page.title: 10HAPPY EATER RESTAURANT
page.content: WE WENT TO INTERVIEW THE STAFF AT THE HAPPY EATER RESTAURANT AND TO HAVE A MEAL THERE AS IT FEATURES PROMINENTLY IN THE LIFE STYLE OF MANY OF THE YOUNGER RESIDENTS IN THE AREA. IT IS OPEN FROM IOAM UNTIL IOPM,SERVING ON AVERAGE 3OO MEALS A DAY. THE STAFF FINDS THAT THE AVERAGE PERSON SPENDS Â£3 ON A MEAL. THE BUSIEST TIME DURING THE WEEK IS AT LUNCH TIME, WEEKENDS AND ESPECIALLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON.DURING THE WEEK THE HAPPY EATER IS USED MAINLY BY BUSINESSMEN AND AT THE WEEKEND BY FAMILIES.THIS IS BECAUSE IT SERVES FAST FOOD AND IS WELL EQUIPPED FOR YOUNG CHILDREN, PROVIDING GAMES, LEGO, BOOSTER SEATS AND A CHILDREN'S MENU. NEXT DOOR TO THE HAPPY EATER IS THE TRAINING BRANCH WHERE THE RESTAURANT MANAGERS ARE TRAINED. .
